title: Les Bougon - c'est aussi ça la vie!
overview: Les Bougon - c'est aussi ça la vie! follows the antics of the Bougon family, who have sworn to do anything they can to cheat the system. They plan all sorts of schemes to scam money out of normal citizens and businesses. This is usually easily accomplished thanks to their many accomplices, who are just as crooked as they are.
